title: More bans?

embed.description: Today's red post collection includes Ask Riot on the LCU and the Death Recap system, Doom Bots of Doom back in the RGMQ this weekend, a look at new LoL facebook stickers, a rundown on 2016 ranked rewards as the season winds down in under two weeks, additional context on the pre-season stealth changes, and more!

body:
Unconfirmed 10 bans in champion select.

Discuss.

replies.body:
For the longest time I've wanted to see a combination of god tier, flavour of the month, hard counter and common one trick champions all wiped from the board at once. If that were to happen the next couple of tiers would open up and a greater variety of champions would appear. 

I'm under the impression that the effect of 10 bans could be huge.

I think a Dota style system should be used or something like: 3 bans per team, then 2 picks per team then final 2 bans per team.

Since the 6 ban system was made when there were like 60 champions or something and now there is more than double that, it certainly has to increase
More than 6 will change the game quite abit 10 will abit much i agree
I feel like 8 will be sufficient. 10 is a bit much imo.
